request.description: This endpoint is used to retrieve a list of shortened URLs along with their original counterparts. Upon a successful GET request to the specified URL, the server will respond with a status code of 200 and a JSON array containing objects with "original_url" and "shortened_url" properties. The "original_url" property represents the original long URL, while the "shortened_url" property contains the corresponding shortened URL.

This API endpoint is used to shorten a given URL. When a POST request is made to this endpoint, with the original URL provided in the request body, a shortened URL is generated and returned in the response.

### Request Body

- original_url (string, required): The original URL that needs to be shortened.
    

### Response

- Status: 201
- Content-Type: application/json
- original_url (string): The original URL provided in the request.
- shortened_url (string): The shortened URL generated by the API.

The request should be sent to [http://127.0.0.1:8000/url_shortener/original_url](http://127.0.0.1:8000/url_shortener/original_url) with a JSON payload in the raw request body type. The payload should include a key "shortened_url" with the value of the original URL that needs to be shortened.

Upon successful execution, the response will have a status code of 200 and a content type of application/json. The response body will contain the key "original_url" with the value of the shortened URL.
